instanceInactive.title: Instance Access Restricted
instanceInactive.description:
Access to the instance '{instanceName}' has been temporarily suspended due to administrative or billing issues.

To restore access, please contact your instance administrator at: {contactEmail}

userInactive.title: Your Subscription is Inactive
userInactive.description: Your personal subscription for the instance '{instanceName}' is not active. To reactivate your access, please renew your subscription or contact instance support at: {contactEmail}

noProfile.title: User Profile Not Found
noProfile.description: We couldn't find a user profile associated with your account. This might be a configuration error. Please try signing out and back in.

unknown.title: Access Denied
unknown.description: An unexpected error occurred while verifying your access. Please try again.
